area.key: Notifications will be sent to this address instead of group members (optional)
The fallback publishing group for cases when no workflows are configured

Controls how the original author is managed in subsequent tasks. Explicit requires all steps be approved, including steps where the original change author is a group member. Implicit auto-approves steps where the author is a member of the approving group.

Controls editing access on a content node in a workflow. Set to true to prevent edits on content while in a workflow, set to false to allow the active workflow group to make modifications to content without having to cancel the workflow process.
Should email notifications be sent to approval groups?
Edit site URL for inclusion in email notifications (eg http://edit.mydomain.com)
Live site URL for inclusion in email notifications (eg http://www.mydomain.com)
Nodes (and their descendants) selected here will NOT be included in the workflow, and will revert to the default Umbraco actions
Configure default workflows for all nodes of a given content type
These workflows apply only to the specified node
Describe the group's role and responsibilities. This value is only displayed here
Set to true to allow users in this group to approve changes without logging in to the backoffice. Refer to the documentation for full details and setup.
